privacyPolicyBody: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text used in the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text since the 15th century when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. Five centuries have not eliminated this text; it has even become used in its original form in electronic printing and typesetting. It spread widely in the 1960s with the release of Letraset plastic sheets containing passages from this text, and recently it has spread again with the emergence of electronic publishing software such as Aldus PageMaker, which also contained copies of Lorem Ipsum text.
